name: CatchThem
description:
The objective is to draw a line with the mouse and try to capture the number and type of pieces that appear in the upper left corner trying not to capture other types of pieces.
Anything that collides with the drawn line will be captured.
Be careful not to capture other types of pieces. Be smart enough to decide when to start drawing the line, but watch out for time left. When you consider it appropriate use gravity and time capsules to make the task easier.

To draw a line:
- Decide when it is convenient to start by pressing the left mouse button. 
- Draw the line across the screen by moving the mouse. 
- When you decide to finish the line, simply release the left mouse button. If you caught the target’s pieces and made fewer mistakes than the maximums allowed in the level, you will get “goal accomplished” and more points, if you don’t get it you will lose points.

Timelapse: if you have time capsules available (lower left corner) and press the SPACE key, it will stop the time and this way it will be much easier for you to fulfill the objective.

While drawing the line, other types of figures may appear randomly:
- a heart: catch it and it will receive an extra life
- a time capsule: catch it so you can use it and stop time.
- a diamond: catch it to get more points
- a planet earth: catch it and all the pieces fall by the effect of gravity

Also, sometimes there will be wind, be careful as the pieces will move by the force of it.

Thank you very much for your support!
